item.title: OOP
item.description: OOP (object oriented programming) is a programming paradigm based on the concept of objects. Data is in the form of fields(aka. attributes or properties) and the code is in the form of procedures (aka methods). OOP Concepts Random fact of the day: The acronym OOP can refer to a lot of things, even as a jargon for software developers. Object Oriented Positioning Object Oriented Programming Out of Position Ordinary Object Pointer (JDK)
